text: Beilin District (, pinyin:Bēilín Qū) is a district of Xi'an, Shaanxi, China. It's in center of Xi'an. Its name comes from Stele Forest (碑林, Beilin). Area of the district is 264.41 km2 and as of November 2010, 806,811 live in here. The district is famous in tour. Category:Shaanxi Category:Districts of China
title: Beilin District
